select
distinct
,
from dw_employee_information
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from dw_employee_information
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dw_employee_information WHERE `NAME` not LIKE "保安"
mapper.insert: insert into dw_employee_information (ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, EMPLOYEE_ID, EMPLOYEE_ACCOUNT, NAME, EMPLOYEE_AGE, BUSINESS_TODAY, AVERAGE_PROCESS_TIME, EMPLOYEE_STATE, EMPLOYEE_SEX, EMPLOYEE_EDUCATION, EMAIL, PHONE, MOBILE, USER_TYPE, LOGIN_IP, HALL_ID, JOBS, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_FLAG, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG, EMPLOYEE_BIRTHDAY, MONITOR_FLAG, WATCH_CODE, WORK_POSITION, WORK_STATE, WORK_TIME, ON_DUTY, BIND_STATE, CHANGE_TIME, MY_WORK, PHOTO, TEMP_WORK) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessToday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{averageProcessTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hallId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{employeeBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{monitorFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{watchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{onDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bindState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{myWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{tempWork})
